column2: An ogre called Shrek (Myers) finds his swamp overrun by fairy tale creatures who have been banished by the corrupt Lord Farquaad (Lithgow) aspiring to be king. Shrek makes a deal with Farquaad to regain control of his swamp in return for rescuing Princess Fiona (Diaz)

column1: Shrek 2 ` PG-13 ` Shrek 2 takes place following the events of the first film
column2: with Shrek and Donkey meeting Fiona's parents as her zealous Fairy Godmother
column3: who wants Fiona to marry her son Prince Charming
column4: plots to destroy Shrek and Fiona's marriage. ` 105 ` https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/b/b9/Shrek_2_poster.jpg

column1: 2001: A Space Odyssey ` 18 ` 2001: A Space Odyssey is a 1968 epic science fiction film produced and directed by Stanley Kubrick. The screenplay was written by Kubrick and Arthur C. Clarke
column2: and was inspired by Clarke's 1951 short story "The Sentinel" and other short stories by Clarke. A novel released after the film's premiere was in part written concurrently with the screenplay. The film
column3: which follows a voyage to Jupiter with the sentient computer HAL after the discovery of an alien monolith affecting human evolution
column8: and the possibility of extraterrestrial life. ` 164 ` https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/11/2001_A_Space_Odyssey_%281968%29.png/220px-2001_A_Space_Odyssey_%281968%29.png

column1: Charlie and the chocolate factory ` PG ` Charlie and the Chocolate Factory is a 2005 musical fantasy film directed by Tim Burton and written by John August
column2: based on the 1964 British novel of the same name by Roald Dahl. The film stars Johnny Depp as Willy Wonka and Freddie Highmore as Charlie Bucket
column9: and Christopher Lee. The storyline follows Charlie as he wins a contest along with four other children and is led by Wonka on a tour of his chocolate factory. ` 115 ` https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/17/Charlie_and_the_Chocolate_Factory_%28film%29.png

column1: Snowpiercer ` R ` A post-apocalyptic ice age forces humanity's last survivors aboard a globe-spanning supertrain. One man (Chris Evans) will risk everything to lead a revolt for control of the engine and the future of the world. ` 125 ` https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/b4/Snowpiercer_poster.jpg/220px-Snowpiercer_poster.jpg
Coraline ` PG ` An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home
column2: but it has sinister secrets. When Coraline moves to an old house
column3: she feels bored and neglected by her parents. She finds a hidden door with a bricked up passage. ` 100 ` https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/3/36/Coraline_poster.jpg/220px-Coraline_poster.jpg

column1: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It ` 15 ` Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren take on one of the most sensational cases of their careers after a cop stumbles upon a dazed and bloodied young man walking down the road. Accused of murder
column2: the suspect claims demonic possession as his defense
column3: forcing the Warrens into a supernatural inquiry unlike anything they've ever seen before. ` 112 ` https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/e/e8/The_Conjuring_-_The_Devil_Made_Me_Do_It.png/220px-The_Conjuring_-_The_Devil_Made_Me_Do_It.png
